To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this, contact audio@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite audio file information in email.
mods.abstract: Recording of interviews and phone conversations with Randy Travis (performer), George Jones (performer), Charlie Daniels (performer), Keith Whitley (performer), Lorrie Morgan (performer), Holly Dunn (performer), Mickey Gilley (performer), Vanna White, and Hoyt Axton (performer), conducted by Keith Bilbrey (DJ) on radio station WSM (Nashville, Tenn.)

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
